1.content:
Sinjin had always been the weird one at Hollywood Arts, teased, mocked, etc but no more he was tired of it. Recently he had been studying on machines and how to build them. Sinjin was in theater room working on his first invention the body swapper it was a machine with two chairs with wires attached leading to a red button between the chairs. He had just finish with the final touches and wiped the sweat off his face “finally I’m done 4 weeks with no help and teachers asking what I been doing” he said, “now all I need is to try it out on to see if it really works but who”. There was a whole school to try it out on but the first people to pop into his head were Tori the most popular girl that everyone admired and knew, there was also Beck the guy all the girls loved and wanted to go out with, them there was Andre one of Tori’s close friends he could swap with him and get to know Tori a little more, and then there was Cat the one girl he could easily trick into swapping with him.

Right when Sinjin was going to make his mind up the principal called him on the intercom “Sinjin please report to my office I repeat Sinjin please report to my office thank you”. He covered up the machine with a blanket and walked out of the theater. Moments later the door opened and who step in?
1.title: Sinjin builds the body swap machine

132.title: Another reason she was there.

1321.content:
Cat went running in the theater and put a chair in front of the door. Cat was hiding from Jade because at lunch she was showing Jade a product she had bought online that would clean anything within seconds. She had put a pair of Jade’s favorite scissors in the machine and instead of cleaning them it ended up destroying them so since then she has been hiding from Jade.
There was loud bagging at the door.

“CAT I KNOW YOUR IN THERE OPEN THIS DOOR!” Jade shouted. “I JUST WANT TO TALK THATS ALL!”

Cat nervously walked up to the door and leaned against it

“Your not gonna hurt me?” Cat replied

“No I just want to talk that’s all we can talk right Cat we’re friends.” Jade said.

Cat moved the chair and unlocked the door. Jade open the the door and walked in. She closed the door behind her and locked it. Jade walked up to cat and told her to take a seat. Cat did what she was told but she had sat on one of the chairs from Sinjin’s machine.

“So what did you want to talk to me about?” Cat said quietly. “I already told you I’m sorry for breaking your scissors. I didn’t know the machine was gonna do that.”

Jade smiles and shook her head.
“Those weren’t just any scissors Cat those were my FIRST SCISSORS the first scissors I have ever gotten I always carry them around with me for good luck and now there gone. Their is no way to get another pair like that so I need you to go out after school and I find a pair that looks like the ones I use to have.” She demanded.

Jade sat down on the other chair that was attached to the machine. She stretched her arms out and accidentally pushed the button. Both there bodies froze in place unable to move.

“Cat what’s going on?” Jade said.

“I didn’t do anything I swear I can’t move.” Cat replied.

From both there point of views it seemed like the room was spinning faster and faster till they both blacked out.
1321.title: She was hiding from Jade

choices: Play it off act like Cat
13211.content:
Jade slowly started opening her eyes. Her head felt like some one was banging it over and over.

“Man what happened that felt really weird”. She said covering her mouth. “That’s not my voice.”

She looked down at her self and saw the same pink dress and pink flats that Cat was wearing and to make matters worse cats red hair fell down in her face. Jade turned her head and saw her body unconscious in the other chair.

“This can’t be happing I’m dreaming I have to be dreaming this can’t be real how can I be in Cats body?” She said.

Jade got up and walked over to her body and started shaking in.

“Wake up Cat are you in my body CAT!” She shouted.

Jade saw her eyes opening slowly then they got wide as her body pushed her to the ground.

“Get away from me I’m Cat not you.” Cat said.

She got up from the chair and ran out of the theater.

“Cat wait come back it’s me Jade we switched bodies.” She yelled

Jade went running out of the theater after Cat but she was no where in sight. She saw Robbie getting a drink from the juice machine she walked over to him. She grabbed his jacket and pinned him against the machine.

“Did you see where cat went” she asked

“Cat what’s wrong with you?” Robbie replied in pain. “You are Cat.”

That’s when she remember she was Cat.
13211.title: Jade’s pov

choices: Cat, feeling scared in Jade’s body.
132112.content:
Jade sighed and decided to tell him, he left go of him, which he sighed in relief.

Jade said “Robbie, it’s me...Jade...that stupid swap body machine in the theater room made this happen.”

Robbie was then shocked and scared, his poor kitty Cat was in a very scary but good looking body, Robbie looked at Jade and said “Ok, I believe you, Jade. My poor kitty Cat...for once, I agree with you to hurt someone who build that stupid machine!”

Then Jade remembered a friend Cat has, and was also surprised Robbie acted this way, he must really care about her.

Jade smiled and says “Ok. I think I know of a friend who can help us out.”

They left the school and went over to Sam and Cat’s house.

Sam was watching TV, when she heard the door ring, she groaned and walked up to the door.

Sam opened the door to see Robbie and Cat there.

Sam said “Hey love birds, what’s up? Got a show I need to get back on.”

Cat then said “Sam, it’s me...Jade...” Sam then widened her eyes and started at them saying “Ok. What happened?”

Robbie said “There was a stupid machine that swaps bodies, and Cat and Jade were there when it turned on by accident, they were in the theater when this happened, can you help us find Cat and the person behind the machine?”

Knowing her best friend was in danger, she said “Of course I’ll help you, poor kid, I hope she’s ok.”

They went back and rode on Sam’s motorcycle, since they got here using Cat’s bike since Jade didn’t have access to her car, and Sam’s motorcycle was cool.

They got back to Hollywood arts to find...
